netcdf_csv 0.0.1 documentation
previous | next | index

Dataset Class¶

The dataset is the basic class where all variable metadata and data arrays are stored.

Class Attributes and Methods:

class snc_dataset.Dataset(file_string=None)¶

Dataset object imitating netCDF Dataset

Class Attributes

Attributes:Dictionary of dataset attributes
Dimensions:Dictionary of dataset variable dimensions
Filepath:The file path used to instantiate the current dataset
Globals:Attributes that apply to the entire dataset (e.g. conventions)
Snc_DateTime:Not used
Variables:Dictionary of dataset variable objects
addVarDimension(varname)¶

Sets variable dimension in dataset

Requires variable already exists and variable name is correctly passed to function.

createGlobal(gvarname, *args, **kwargs)¶

Sets global variable attributes

Gvarname:variable that applies to the whole Dataset
Args:values that follow gvars in the TSV
createVariable(varname, *args, **kwargs)¶

Creates dataset variable

Varname:variable name

kwargs

Datatype:type of data for each variable
Dimensions:dimension of variable
classmethod readFromTSV(file_string, globaltag='this_file')¶

Creates Dataset class from TSV file

Filestring:File string of the TSV file used to create the new class instance
Globaltag:Tag used to identify attributers that apply to the entire TSV file. Default is this_file
setVarAttribute(var, *args, **kwargs)¶

Sets variable attributes

setVarData(varname, *args, **kwargs)¶

Sets variable data array.
